text: Ani phira'auna mhanala, he darabari lokanno! Mi tara apalyakherija dusarya konala tumaca upasya (mabuda) janata nahi. Aika, he hamana! Tu majhyasathi matila agita bhajava, maga majhyasathi eka mahala tayara kara, yasathi ki musacya upasyala dokavuna pahave. Mi tara tyala khotya lokampaikica samajata ahe
